## atRuleClonerPlugin variable

A dummy PostCSS plugin that clones any at rule with params `to-clone` to a new at rule with params `cloned`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
atRuleClonerPlugin: {
    postcssPlugin: string;
    prepare(): {
        AtRuleExit(atRule: AtRule): void;
    };
}
```
